text: In December 2017, after pregnancy rumors swirled around the duo for months, Khloé Kardashian announced that she was expecting with boyfriend Tristan Thompson. And now, just days before Khloé is expected to give birth to a baby daughter, cheating rumors have engulfed the couple after TMZ released footage of what appeared to be Thompson with several other women. Neither party has publicly commented on the situation as of yet, and at the end of the day we have no idea what goes on in the couple ’ s private relationship ( nor should we ). So we ’ ll avoid making any assumptions at this time. However, many fans currently have questions about Thompson, one in particular being : What is Tristan Thompson ’ s net worth? Thompson, the Cleveland Cavaliers center / power forward, signed a five - year contract
